attributes.action: Replace the current national anthem of England with Ignition (Remix) by R. Kelly
attributes.background: For too long our nation has been bereft of a national identity that fits the hip hop groove of the modern age. With this simple act of changing the English national anthem, we can show that our country is fun, exciting and in touch with the people.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
